subject: p16751749
History: Chest tube, to assess for pneumothorax.
Findings: In comparison with the earlier study of this date, the monitoring and support devices remain in place. No definite pneumothorax, though this could be difficult to detect in view of the extremely large amount of subcutaneous gas.
